name: Unmechanical
description:
This script facilitates the installation of the native Linux game "Unmechanical" provided by GOG.
A big thank you to the people who help to play this game in the best conditions on Linux.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.setup: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
custom-name: Unmechanical - GOG
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: setup
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/data/noarch
